name: gmail-rag-extension
description: RAG-powered Gmail search with Gemini AI integration

scripts.build: esbuild src/background.js src/popup.js --bundle --outdir=dist --format=iife --minify=false --keep-names && cp src/*.html src/*.css dist/
scripts.package: npm run build && zip -r extension.zip dist/ manifest.json icons/ logo.png -x '*.map' -x '**/node_modules/**'
